title: N172 Ed Williamson and Kid Baldwin For Sale
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: N172 Ed Williamson and Kid Baldwin For Sale
posts.post_content:
One of the nicest looking "GOOD" cards you're going to see of the former home run champion. Nice dark picture. One minor imperfection along the edge on the lower right quadrant on the front (touching his left shoe) and a couple of stray ink(?) marks at the top edge of the back.

$325 delivered.

posts.post_title: Bump for Price Reduction and New Card
posts.post_content:
I've lowered the price on the Williamson to $325 delivered and have added the Clarence "Kid" Baldwin card below.

Unfortunately, the Baldwin card is amateurishly rebacked, but it presents a perfect opportunity to pick up a very scarce Old Judge card for a fraction of the Near Mint value. Nice clear picture of a player who could have been a star had he not fallen in love with the bottle. $375 delivered
